title: Uniform Fiduciary Access to Digital Assets Act
context: [ยง556A-11] Disclosure of digital assets held in trust when trustee is original user. Unless otherwise ordered by the court or provided in a trust, a custodian shall disclose to a trustee that is an original user of an account any digital asset of the account held in trust, including a catalogue of electronic communications of the trustee and the content of electronic communications. [L 2016, c 162, pt of ยง1]
